mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, TEMP.* FROM ( SELECT AREA, YEAR, SEASON, PRIMARY_INDUSTRY_ABS AS PRIMARY_INDUSTRY, SECONDARY_INDUSTRY_ABS AS SECONDARY_INDUSTRY, TERTIARY_INDUSTRY_ABS AS TERTIARY_INDUSTRY FROM REGIONAL_GDP WHERE AREA='南通' ORDER BY YEAR DESC, GDP_ABS ASC ) TEMP ) TABLE_ALIAS WHERE TABLE_ALIAS.ROWNO BETWEEN 1 AND 8
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT SEASON) FROM REGIONAL_GDP WHERE YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT AREA, YEAR, SEASON, PRIMARY_INDUSTRY_ABS AS PRIMARY_INDUSTRY, SECONDARY_INDUSTRY_ABS AS SECONDARY_INDUSTRY, TERTIARY_INDUSTRY_ABS AS TERTIARY_INDUSTRY FROM REGIONAL_GDP WHERE YEAR = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SEASON = #{season,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, TEMP.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM COMPOSITION_REGIONAL_GDP WHERE AREA='南通' ORDER BY YEAR DESC ) TEMP ) TABLE_ALIAS WHERE TABLE_ALIAS.ROWNO BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, TEMP.* FROM ( SELECT AREA, YEAR, MONTH, CURRENT_MONTH_ABS AS CURRENT_MONTH FROM IMPORT_VALUE WHERE AREA='南通' ORDER BY YEAR DESC, MONTH DESC ) TEMP ) TABLE_ALIAS WHERE TABLE_ALIAS.ROWNO BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, TEMP.* FROM ( SELECT AREA, YEAR, VALUE_ABS AS POPULATION FROM POPULATION_VALUE WHERE AREA='南通' ORDER BY YEAR DESC ) TEMP ) TABLE_ALIAS WHERE TABLE_ALIAS.ROWNO BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, TEMP.* FROM ( SELECT AREA, YEAR, NUMERICAL_VALUE AS POPULATION FROM POPULATION_URBAN WHERE AREA='南通' ORDER BY YEAR DESC ) TEMP ) TABLE_ALIAS WHERE TABLE_ALIAS.ROWNO BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, TEMP.* FROM ( SELECT AREA, YEAR, VALUE_ABS AS POPULATION FROM POPULATION_VALUE_HJ WHERE AREA='南通' ORDER BY YEAR DESC ) TEMP ) TABLE_ALIAS WHERE TABLE_ALIAS.ROWNO BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, TEMP.* FROM ( SELECT AREA, YEAR, TOTAL_ABS AS TOTAL FROM REAL_ESTATE_NEW_CONSTRUCTION WHERE AREA='南通' AND MONTH='12月份' ORDER BY YEAR DESC ) TEMP ) TABLE_ALIAS WHERE TABLE_ALIAS.ROWNO BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, TEMP.* FROM ( SELECT AREA, YEAR, TOTAL_ABS AS TOTAL FROM REAL_ESTATE_CONSTRUCTION WHERE AREA='南通' AND MONTH='12月份' ORDER BY YEAR DESC ) TEMP ) TABLE_ALIAS WHERE TABLE_ALIAS.ROWNO BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, TEMP.* FROM ( SELECT AREA, YEAR, TOTAL_ABS AS TOTAL FROM REAL_ESTATE_BUILD_COMPLETED WHERE AREA='南通' AND MONTH='12月份' ORDER BY YEAR DESC ) TEMP ) TABLE_ALIAS WHERE TABLE_ALIAS.ROWNO BETWEEN 1 AND 10

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWNO, TEMP.* FROM ( SELECT AREA, YEAR, TOTAL_ABS AS TOTAL FROM REAL_ESTATE_SALE WHERE AREA='南通' AND MONTH='12月份' ORDER BY YEAR DESC ) TEMP ) TABLE_ALIAS WHERE TABLE_ALIAS.ROWNO BETWEEN 1 AND 10
